BBEX3.M.BMD.EUR.CA.AB.A01: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Bermuda * / EUR 1 = BMD ... (selling)
General: Fixed exchange rate to the US dollar.
Source: Bermuda Commercial Bank Limited, Hamilton.

Methodology: * We do not have any data from Bermuda on euro exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of the US dollar selling rate in Bermuda (USD 1 = BMD 1.0043) in conjunction with the respective euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
